meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of an isthmus.
meanings.sent1: The isthmian land bridge connected the two continents.
meanings.sent2: The narrow isthmian strip of land separated the two bodies of water.
meanings.sent3: The isthmian region was so narrow that you could see both oceans at the same time!
meanings.sent4: Her isthmian home was like a bridge between the mountains and the sea.
meanings.sent5: The isthmian geography made it a strategic location for trade routes.

meanings.definition: A person who is a member of an isthmian organization or group.
meanings.sent1: As an isthmian, he attended all the meetings of the organization.
meanings.sent2: The isthmian was proud to be part of such a dedicated group.
meanings.sent3: The isthmian group always had interesting events and activities.
meanings.sent4: She felt like an isthmian, connecting different people within the group.
meanings.sent5: Being an isthmian meant being part of a close-knit community.
